channel.title: The Butler Bureau
channel.description: The Butler Bureau Domestic Staff Podcasts
channel.itunes:author: clive @ butlerbureau
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Butler Bureau Podcast interviews mover and shakers in the field of domestic service, training and recruitment
channel.itunes:summary: The Butler Bureau Podcast is where Clive of the Butler Bureau interviews the top domestic staff, trainers, consultants and agency owners in the field of domestic staff employment

item.title: Item 1 - first test podcast
item.description: Welcome to the show it is August 2nd and this is our 1st Butlercast. Today we will be interviewing Steven Ferry of the International Institute of Modern Butlers. Please visit the IIMB site at http://www.modernbutlers.com/
item.itunes:author: Clive @ The Butler Bureau
item.itunes:subtitle: Welcome to the show it is August 2nd and this is our 1st Butlercast.
